title: What's wrong with people having firecracker jinx?
body: Apparently all the firecracker jinx I have seen are ass*****. The first firecracker jinx I saw today was just afk the entire game, and the second one I met gave us the feed-no feed option.  :D I dont know if this is pure coincidence or this skin attracts a particular group of people. {{champion:222}}

replies.body:
So you judging all the Firecracker Jinx players from 2 players.

Oh, ok.
Feed/No-Feed? You mean like AD Carry or feed? You do realize that person probably **just** got that skin and really wanted to use it?

Definetely coincidence. Alot of the players i've met in the last few days who used the skin generally either kept to theirselves or helped their team.

Might just be your luck.
